text:
Does anyone know how this service works behind the scenes? Is the CSS rewritten or does it adjust the existing styles? Is the theme (code & setup) of high quality?

<https://www.HubSpot.com/services/professional/migrations>
From my experience it's rewritten, theme setup is usually pretty similar to the boilerplate with additional modules based on the website, but overall the quality is really good
thank you Federico for sharing your experience.
